author: cnbc.com
title: Delta Dental Names Michael Cembrola Vice President of Mid-Atlantic Sales
text:
NEW YORK & MECHANICSBURG, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Delta Dental of Pennsylvania, Delta Dental of New York, Inc., and their affiliates today named Michael Cembrola as vice president of Mid-Atlantic sales.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180227006746/en/
Michael Cembrola is the new VP of Sales for Delta Dental of Pennsylvania, Delta Dental of New York and affiliates. (Photo: Business Wire)
Cembrola most recently served as assistant vice president of sales and service for Providence Health Plan in Portland, Ore., where he was responsible for overseeing B2B sales and service and for consultant and producer channel management.
Based in Delta Dental’s New York office, Cembrola will oversee sales in Delaware, Maryland, New York, Pennsylvania, West Virginia and the District of Columbia.
A graduate of Providence College in Providence, R.I., Cembrola holds a bachelor’s degree in marketing.
About Delta Dental
Delta Dental of Pennsylvania and Delta Dental of New York, Inc., are part of a group of companies under common management operating in 15 states, the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico. Collectively, the companies provide group and individual dental benefits to 35.4 million people. They are part of the Delta Dental Plans Association, whose member companies collectively cover more than 75 million people nationwide.
